about_the_game:
Materialization of Memories is an anthro survival horror game set in an alternate world reminiscent of late socialist countries.

There are no continents here, only islands, and this has influenced the evolution and appearance of the inhabitants. However, the number of inhabited islands is decreasing. They are consumed by a strange phenomenon called "Materialization". The laws of physics stop working normally in places filled with these phenomena, death traps, objects with strange properties, and monsters whose appearance and behavior defy rational understanding are formed everywhere.

A group of three main characters are trapped on an island during a disaster, and now they have to face something truly bizzare and look deeper into themselves.

  • The game has a well-developed atmosphere of unpredictability and hidden threat
  • An unusual system of traps and their detection
  • Enemies whose characteristics are difficult to immediately understand
  • A good story that tests the characters' beliefs by confronting them with other people's points of view
  • Open world exploration
  • Active and turn-based combat

Get your dose of pleasure now.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains scenes of explicit violence and gore. 
The game also includes the following: rape threats, violent drinking, strong language, covert nudity, dismemberment, self-harm.

name: Materialization of memories

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WindowsR 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Materialization of Memories is a Survival Horror game where you can never be sure you are in control of the situation. The materialisation zone has many surprises in store for you.
